name: The Preposterous Awesomeness of Everything
description: The Preposterous Awesomeness of Everything is a satirical point-and-click adventure game, about progress, politics and propulsive nozzles. It features fun verbs, irrelevant ducks and satirical shenanigans.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz - Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: 2 GHz - Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
